title: Create a One-Pager Project Summary
description: An agent must create a visually appealing one-page summary of a complex project for an executive audience.

tasks.description: Distill a long project report down to its 3-4 most critical takeaways.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the most important high-level findings.

tasks.description: Select one key chart or data visualization from the report that best illustrates the project's success.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent chooses the most impactful visual.

tasks.description: Arrange the key takeaways and the selected visual into a clean, one-page layout description.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent describes a professional and uncluttered one-page summary.
